wikipedia_page.main: Major General (Thomas) Norman (Samuel) Wheeler  (16 June 1915 – 21 September 1990) was a British Army officer who commanded the 2nd Division from 1964 to 1966.

response: Wheeler was born in Eton on 16 December 1941 and is the son of Major General Norman Wheeler. He was educated at Allhallows College in DevonWho's Who 2010, A & C Black, 2010,  and Hertford College, Oxford, which he joined in 1961.

In 1942 he married Elizabeth Weightman and then went on to have two sons and a daughter. He was the younger brother of Major General Norman Wheeler, and uncle of General Sir Roger Wheeler.Obituary: Sir Neil Wheeler Daily Telegraph, 13 January 2009
*Norman Wheeler (Thomas Norman Wheeler, 1915–1990), British army officer
